original_text: I thought that you must be that bad man who came from Egypt. He was the one who fought against our Roman government. Some time ago, he led 4,000 of his own men out into the wilderness, with their weapons.’
korean_text: 그러면 네가 이전에 소요를 일으켜 자객 사천 명을 거느리고 광야로 가던 애굽인이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: I thought that you must be that bad man
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 바로 그 나쁜 사람이라고 생각했다

sentences.original_text: He was the one who fought against our Roman government
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 로마 정부를 반대하여 싸운 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: he led 4,000 of his own men out into the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 부하 4,000명을 이끌고 광야로 나갔다
